mapper.select: /* kr.co.dbvision.api.mhs.hrm.mhshrm005.service.mapper.Mhshrm005Mapper.insertMhshrm005UseChk */ SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM MHS_DEPT_ORGNZT WHERE ORGNZT_CODE = TRIM(#{orgnztCode}) AND DEPT_CODE = TRIM(#{deptCode})

/* kr.co.dbvision.api.mhs.hrm.mhshrm005.service.mapper.Mhshrm005Mapper.insertMhshrm005UseChk */ SELECT NVL(SUM(A.CNT),0) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) >= 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS CNT FROM MHS_ORGNZT WHERE ORGNZT_CODE = TRIM(#{orgnztCode}) UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) >= 1 THEN 2 ELSE 0 END AS CNT FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE DEPT_CODE = TRIM(#{deptCode}) ) A

/* kr.co.dbvision.api.mhs.hrm.mhshrm005.service.mapper.Mhshrm005Mapper.selectMhshrm005RspofcCodeCombo */ SELECT ORGNZT_CODE, (SELECT ORGNZT_NM FROM MHS_ORGNZT WHERE ORGNZT_CODE=A.ORGNZT_CODE) AS ORGNZT_NM, DEPT_CODE, (SELECT DEPT_KOR_NM FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE DEPT_CODE=A.DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_KOR_NM, USE_BEGIN_DE, USE_END_DE, USE_AT, SORT_ORDR, REG_DT, REG_ID, UPT_DT, UPT_ID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM STM_USERS WHERE USER_ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NM, (SELECT USER_NM FROM STM_USERS WHERE USER_ID = A.UPT_ID) AS UPT_NM
FROM MHS_DEPT_ORGNZT A WHERE USE_AT = '1' ORDER BY SORT_ORDR, ORGNZT_CODE
